summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5836 for the improvement of East 86th Street, from 15th Avenue Northeast to approximately 230 feet west thereof; by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 76952, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
